result.execSummary:
The defendant Fernando J. SALAZAR was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Battery, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

miscConds.notes: If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.
Maintain fulltime employment, schooling or a combination of both.

Pay supervision fees in an amount to be determined by the Department of Corrections.

Assessment, treatment, counseling as deemed appropriate by the Department's assessment process.

Undergo anger management assessment and follow through.

Provide DNA sample.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

Defendant filed a petition for appointment of counsel.  Court denies petition.  Defendant is not indigent.  Preliminary hearing is set for 02-24-16 at 1:30 p.m.  (note given).  If defendant obtains counsel, this will be an adjourned initial appearance.

BAIL HEARING - 
Defendant in custody on arrest warrant and appearing by video from the Manitowoc County Jail.   The matter is continued for initial appearance on 02-01-16 at 2:30 p.m.  Bail is set at $1,000.00 recognizance bond with the conditions that defendant must report to the Manitowoc City Police Department for fingerprints, photographs and other identifying information within 24 hours and defendant is to have no contact with Jordan Walters and any premises he occupies.   Bail furnished.
